column4: hi there i have just reformatted a hard drive on my system i can mount it but cant write to it can any advise please
ï»¿hi there i have just reformatted a hard drive on my system i can mount it but cant write to it can any advise please
Be sure it is mounted with read and write permissions and that you are the owner of the drive.
aha! Well, for now, you can fix that by going into the directory where the drive is mounted and in the terminal: sudo chown -R <your username>:<your username> <drive directory>
